snippet: Talk about Colts quarterback Peyton Manning's future in Indianapolis has dominated the first two days of Super Bowl week.
abstract: Talk about Colts quarterback Peyton Manning's future in Indianapolis has dominated the first two days of Super Bowl week.
lead_paragraph: When Indianapolis was selected to host the 2012 Super Bowl in 2008, many wondered if the Colts would be the first team to play for the Vince Lombardi Trophy on their home field.

headline.main: Leading Off: If Peyton Manning Is Leaving, He Isn't Going Quietly
